body:
Hello

Although, next tournament should technically be TDM/KOTH, we are looking for opinions from the community. Vote for what gamemode you want T3 to be here:
http://strawpoll.me/6215125

Thank you

The Officials
body_tagged:

replies.body:
OP: I think after this tourney we need something different to normal tournaments.

Side note: maybe a smaller event afterwards with a couple of representatives from each team and then they do a mini match on a smaller scale? Like 5v5 or something, just an idea.

replies.body: I want to see a massive, one day, Red Alert Tournament. Have a Bo5 for 8 people in one group. Top 4 moves on and joins other group etc... That way, there could be possibly 200 people participating. At the end, find the average of each player's ranking. Team with best average score wins. Talk to me on skype if you want to know more xd. I've had many dreams of a tournament like this.
